song_name: the lakes - the long pond studio sessions
lyrics:
9 contributorstranslationsespañoltürkçefrançais​the lakes the long pond studio sessions lyricsverse 1
is it romantic how all my elegies eulogize me
im not cut out for all these cynical clones
these hunters with cell phones

chorus
take me to the lakes where all the poets went to die
i dont belong and my beloved neither do you
those windermere peaks look like a perfect place to cry
im setting off but not without my muse

verse 2
what should be over burrowеd under my skin
in heartstopping waves of hurt
ivе come too far to watch some namedropping sleaze
tell me what are my words worth

chorus
take me to the lakes where all the poets went to die
i dont belong and my beloved neither do you
those windermere peaks look like a perfect place to cry
im setting off but not without my muse

bridge
i want auroras and sad prose
i want to watch wisteria grow right over my bare feet
cause i havent moved in years
and i want you right here
a red rose grew up out of ice frozen ground
with no one around to tweet it
while i bathe in cliffside pools
with my calamitous love and insurmountable grief
see taylor swift liveget tickets as low as 172you might also likechorus
take me to the lakes where all the poets went to die
i dont belong and my beloved neither do you
those windermere peaks look like a perfect place to cry
im setting off but not without my muse
no not without you
no not without you1embed
